Label for the version history grid column which contains the author of the revision
Label for the version history grid column which contains the size of a revision
Label for the version history grid column which contains the summary of a revision

enhanced-standard-uis-history-grid-heade: Label for the version history grid column which contains difference of the size of a revision

Label for button to switch to previous panel page
Label for button to switch to next panel page
Label for button to switch to last panel page

enhancedfilelist: Special page name for [[Special:EnhancedFilelist]] special page.
enhanced-standard-uis-filelist-grid-file: Label for filelist grid column which contains file name
enhanced-standard-uis-filelist-grid-auth: Label for filelist grid column which contains uploader of file
enhanced-standard-uis-filelist-grid-date: Label for filelist grid column which contains date of upload of file
enhanced-standard-uis-filelist-grid-type: Label for filelist grid column which contains type of file
enhanced-standard-uis-filelist-grid-size: Label for filelist grid column which contains size of file

enhanced-standard-uis-filelist-grid-comm: Label for filelist grid column which contains comment of file

enhanced-standard-uis-filelist-panel-new: Label of button which opens a dialog to upload a new file
enhanced-standard-uis-filelist-panel-til: Label of button to switch the visual representation of file list to a tiles view
enhanced-standard-uis-filelist-panel-lis: Label of button to switch the visual representation of file list to a list view
enhanced-standard-uis-filelist-dialog-in: Title of dialog which contains information of a file

Label for booklet menu to select version history page
Label for booklet menu to select meta data page
Label on dialog page if there is no metadata for this file
